department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) / Ministre des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC)
short_summary: Accommodation and Dining for the Junior Canadian Rangers National Marksmanship Competition
description: To provide rooms and meal planning for the 3rd Canadian Rangers Patrol Group, approximately 160 personnel, for the Junior Canadian Rangers National Marksmanship Competition in St. Catharines, Ontario from May 15-23, 2023
